target.name: usage
target.description: Displays usage examples for this Ant script
target.echo:
Usage examples for the SignServer Ant script
bin/ant -p Prints the main Ant targets supported by this script. bin/ant usage Prints this text with sample usages. bin/ant clean Cleans temporary files, the final EAR file and if this is a source distribution the built JARs directly in the lib folder. bin/ant display-properties Prints the properties that will be used to build and to configure the EAR file. bin/ant configure-ear Puts together the final configured EAR file. bin/ant deploy Configures the EAR file and then deploys it to the application server. bin/ant systemtest:jars Run all available systemtest JARs.
Note: For the binary distribution this commands can be used directly. In other cases SignServer needs to be built first. See doc/README.txt and the Installation Guide for details.
